<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defensive Armaments](/Feats.aspx?ID=3160) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You use bulky firearms or crossbows to shield your body. Any two-handed firearms and two-handed crossbows you wield gain the [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=667) trait. If an appropriate weapon already has the parry trait, increase the circumstance bonus to AC it grants when used to parry from +1 to +2. While parrying with your weapon, you are immune to splash damage.
name: Defensive Armaments
